HeadComp.title: MSG91 - Our team, culture and happy clients.
HeadComp.description: Empowering developers with communication APIs. Building modern communication tools and supporting ideas for startups and enterprises globally.

CompareBannerComp.heading: MSG91 vs Gallabox
CompareBannerComp.subheading: MSG91 and Gallabox enable businesses to streamline WhatsApp communication, but MSG91 goes beyond by offering omnichannel marketing, superior segmentation tools, and enterprise-level scalability, ensuring better automation and engagement.

content.name: Gallabox
content.des: Gallabox is a conversational commerce platform focusing on WhatsApp automation and chatbot-based customer support. While it helps businesses manage customer interactions, it lacks flexibility in API-based messaging and broader communication channels.

content.name: MSG91
content.des: MSG91 goes beyond WhatsApp by offering a truly omnichannel experience, including SMS, email, RCS, and WhatsApp, ensuring seamless customer communication. It provides AI-powered chatbots, advanced workflow automation, and deep analytics to optimize customer engagement. With its cost-effective pricing and superior automation capabilities, MSG91 is the preferred solution for businesses looking for a scalable and feature-rich communication platform.

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
